name: Velcroid 0
description:
Gameboy game made for the GAMES MADE QUICK??? 1½ jam.

Use Velcroid the super sheep to collect the stars.

## Controls

D-pad to move
A button to jump
B button to attack
Select button to restart level

Jump into velcro while pressing the direction of the wall to activate velcro mode (the sheep will start spinning).

## Goal
Collect all the stars open the gate.
Touch the gate to continue to the next level.

## About
Made with the ZGB engine.  
Emulator needed to play the game

## Upcoming features
Power-ups locked behind pick-ups
More levels
Audio
